docs.title: Welcome to the Teacher Technical Manual
Important websites and addresses
docs.text: helpdesk@kentoncityschools.org The email address to submit help desk requests. If you need technical support, email this address. http://go.kcs.me/repairform Laptop repairs for staff and student laptops will use this form to start the process of getting the laptop repaired. https://tech.kentoncityschools.org The KCS Technology Department Website. https://status.kcs.me The KCS Status Board which shows any issues that are currently open in the district.
